
# Experience

```{r}
library(vitae)
library(lubridate)
vroom::vroom("data/experience.csv") %>%
    # select(-description) %>%
    # tidyr::fill(-description) %>%
    mutate(date = as.Date(start, "%m/%d/%Y")) %>%
    arrange(desc(date)) %>%
    detailed_entries( # Order of entries is a little weird here, but it looks good
        where = detail,
        when = glue::glue("{start} - {end}"),
        what = institution,
        with = position,
        why = description,
    )
```
